appDescription.message: Add our checkmarks (✓✓) to your Gmail through our free and unlimited email tracking software.

browserSignUpPopupExplanation.message: Mailtrack is installed but you need to sign in to enable email tracking.

campaignsUpgradeFunnelText.message: Send group emails to up to $MAX_RECEIVERS$ people at a time. They'll receive an individual tracked copy of your message. Hover the mouse over Mailtrack's check marks in your sent folder to see when they've opened/clicked on the email.

campaignsUpgradeFunnelTitle.message: Campaigns is a feature for Mailtrack Advanced users only

campaignsUpgradeFunnelWithDashboardText.message: Send group emails to up to $MAX_RECEIVERS$ people at a time. They'll receive an individual tracked copy of your message. You can view your campaign activity in your dashboard.

This feature is only available with Mailtrack Pro.
Get more detailed information about your tracked emails by upgrading your plan.

showOnlyUnopenedMessages.message: Show only last month’s unopened sent emails

signatureTooltipMessage.message: Remove this signature ad forever from your professional emails.

tccCampaignsExceededText.message:
Sending campaigns is subject to Gmail’s abuse policies and send limits. If you exceed those limits, or your emails are marked as spam by the recipients, Gmail can restrict your account’s usage or even block it temporarily. More info

Please wait at least $MINUTES$ minutes after sending a campaign before sending the next one.

tccCampaignsExceededTitle.message: You can’t send another campaign for at least $MINUTES$ minutes

tccGenericError.message:
Sorry, something did not go well sending this campaign

Please try again later

tccIncompatibleWithScheduleText.message: Unfortunately it's not possible to schedule a campaign right now but we are working to make this possible soon. To deliver your campaign, please send your message manually.

tccIncompatibleWithScheduleTitle.message: Sorry, scheduling is not available with Campaigns.

tccLaunchCampaignText.message: You are about to send a campaign to $recipients$ recipients

tccReceiversExceededText.message: Campaigns is a personal email marketing tool for sending campaigns to up to $MAX_RECEIVERS$ recipients. Please remove some recipients so that there are $MAX_RECEIVERS$ or less. Please note that Gmail can restrict your account or even block it temporarily if you exceed their sending limits or they detect spamming practices. Learn more

tccReceiversExceededTitle.message: Sorry, you've added too many campaign recipients

tccShortcutErrorText.message: Sorry, emails with Campaign cannot be sent yet using Keyboard Shortcuts. Sending has been canceled and the compose window will be reopened.

tccShortcutErrorTitle.message: Please click the Send button to use Campaign.

tccTooltip.message: Mailtrack Campaigns is a personal email marketing tool that can send individually tracked emails to up to $MAX_RECEIVERS$  people at a time. Sending campaigns from Gmail helps you get better open and reply rates, as well as personalize your follow-ups. Campaign sends are subject to Gmail's abuse policies and sending limits.

tccTooltipWithDashboard.message: Mailtrack Campaigns is a personal email marketing tool that sends individually tracked emails to up to $MAX_RECEIVERS$ people at a time. You can view your campaign activity in your dashboard.

tooltipDemoMode.message: Mailtrack is disabled for e-mails sent to yourself.

tooltipOpenMoreThan1000Times.message: This e-mail was opened more than 1000 times; it is not possible to show the detailed history of opens.

tooltipUnlockHistoryTracking.message: Full tracking history includes extended information about every open and link click in your emails

tooltipUnreliableRecipient.message: Caution: the open status of this message may be unreliable. It’s possible that $RECIPIENT$’s email service provider doesn’t allow email tracking. Details.

topBarUpdatePermissionsText.message: We are improving Mailtrack. Please, make sure your account is ready.

trackReplySuccessMessage.message: Mailtrack will notify you after 24 hours if a reply isn't received
